title: Service Provisioning LAN/WiFi Q2
description:
Description
  For whom Telekom
who has to fulfill the order of a managed LAN / WiFi service
provides hardware and the service itself to
a customer
for Installation and using the service
Different from Manual processes

Business Scope:
After the customer has ordered, the hardware will be purchased, pre-staged (if necessary) and sent out to the customer. The licenses have been purchased. Possibly needed additional services (e.g. RMA Packages) are purchased. If requested, the field service has been ordered. These new assets are documented in our asset database. All legal, regulatory and compliance rules are fulfilled (e.g. accounting/activation). Processes are highly automated.
